title: Grand Opening: Brisbane Fortitude Valley Apartments near James St with Rooftop Bar & Terrace
description:
Find your city base with all the comforts of home at Rambla @ Berwick House, where elevated comfort meets Brisbane’s most stylish neighbourhood. Tucked in the exclusive end of Fortitude Valley, you'll be steps from the designer boutiques, acclaimed restaurants and laidback lifestyle of the James St precinct.

Settle into your light-filled one- or two-bedroom apartment, featuring sleek finishes, open-plan living, a full kitchen and your balcony or courtyard - perfect for both short and longer escapes. Unwind with resident perks like a yoga lawn, alfresco BBQs and a sauna. The standout? A rooftop pool with unbeatable views of Brisbane’s skyline.

This boutique stay is far enough from the hustle and bustle of Brisbane, yet still within walking distance to Howard Smith Wharves, the riverfront and Fortitude Valley’s nightlife.
offer_address: 60 Berwick Street, Fortitude Valley, Queensland 4006, Australia
